name: Superboss of the Turnabout
summary: Welcome to Superboss of the Turnabout. Here our trio of lawyers will face one of their strongest opponents yet... a gamer, the true and only boss in the courtroom. After a murder in the gaming convention and agreeing to help another gamer, our characters have gone through many tribulations for several days... but that's not really what matters honestly. What matters is that you get gamer-brained, and prepare for one big battle. The game's on.
